name: R4B-NutritionOrder-R5-NutritionOrder
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B NutritionOrder into FHIR R5

element.display: Diet, formula or nutritional supplement request

target.display: Diet, formula or nutritional supplement request
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionOrder`

element.display: List of the patient's food and nutrition-related allergies and intolerances

target.display: List of the patient's food and nutrition-related allergies and intolerances
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.allergyIntolerance` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionOrder.allergyIntolerance`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Date and time the nutrition order was requested

target.display: The encounter associated with this nutrition order
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionOrder.encounter`

element.display: Enteral formula components

target.display: Enteral formula components

element.display: Product or brand name of the modular additive

target.display: Formula feeding instruction as structured data

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.id`

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The volume of formula to provide

target.display: The volume of formula to provide
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.quantity`

element.display: Speed with which the formula is provided per period of time

target.display: Speed with which the formula is provided per period of time
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.rate[x]` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.rate[x]` - rate[x] has change due to type change: R4B `rate[x]` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `rate[x]`

element.display: Scheduled frequency of enteral feeding

target.display: Scheduling information for enteral formula products
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` - schedule has change due to type change: R4B schedule Timing has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 schedule

element.display: Formula feeding instructions expressed as text

target.display: Formula feeding instructions expressed as text
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administrationInstruction` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administrationInstruction` - administrationInstruction has change due to type change: R4B administrationInstruction string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 administrationInstruction

element.display: Product or brand name of the enteral or infant formula

target.display: Product or brand name of the enteral or infant formula
target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.baseFormulaProductName` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.baseFormulaProductName`

target.comment: R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.baseFormulaType` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.baseFormulaType` - baseFormulaType has change due to type change: R4B baseFormulaType CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 baseFormulaType
